titles: Saducismus triumphatus, or, Full and plain evidence concerning witches and apparitions in two parts : the first treating of their possibility, the second of their real existence / by Joseph Glanvil. With a letter of Dr. Henry More on the same subject and an authentick but wonderful story of certain Swedish witches done into English by Anth. Horneck.
author: Glanvill, Joseph, 1636-1680.
More, Henry, 1614-1687.
Horneck, Anthony, 1641-1697.
publisher: Printed for J. Collins and S. Lownds,
notes: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
